players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Diana was killed on night 1, which means one of Alice or Bob is the mafioso. We need to figure out who."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out."
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. Don't believe her lies about me."

Charlie: "Both Alice and Bob are claiming to be the detective and accusing each other. Since there's only one detective in this game, one of them is definitely lying. The real detective should have investigated someone on night 1, so their claim should be verifiable. I..."
Bob: "I am the real detective. Alice is lying to save herself. Charlie, trust me and vote Alice."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob. He is mafioso. Charlie, you must vote Bob with me to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
